fields.name: DiskEncryptionInfo
fields.description: The recovery disk encryption information (for one / single pass flows).

fields.name: PrimaryStagingAzureStorageAccountId
fields.description: The primary staging storage account Arm Id.

fields.name: RecoveryDiskEncryptionSetId
fields.description: The recovery disk encryption set Id.

fields.name: RecoveryReplicaDiskAccountType
fields.description: The replica disk type. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.

fields.name: RecoveryResourceGroupId
fields.description: The target resource group Arm Id.

fields.name: RecoveryTargetDiskAccountType
fields.description: The target disk type after failover. Its an optional value and will be same as source disk type if not user provided.
